Title: ValueSet TNM Classification Type LOINC
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the type of TNM classification as clinical (cTNM) or pathological (pTNM).

Name: VS_TNM_L_Lymphatic_Invasion_UICC
Title: ValueSet TNM L-Descriptor Lymphatic Invasion UICC
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains the TNM degree of lymphatic invasion codes used with the L-descriptor from TNM 8th edition UICC.

Title: ValueSet TNM N Category UICC
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains the TNM N category codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.

Name: VS_TNM_N_Staging_Type_LOINC
Title: ValueSet TNM N Staging Type LOINC
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the TNM regional lymph nodes (N) category as clinical (cN) or pathological (pN).

Name: VS_TNM_Pn_Perineural_Invasion_UICC
Title: ValueSet TNM Pn-Descriptor Perineural Invasion UICC
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains the TNM degree of perineural (lymphatic nerve sheet) invasion codes used with the Pn-descriptor from TNM 8th edition UICC.

Name: VS_TNM_Prefix_CPU_UICC

Name: VS_TNM_R_Classification_UICC

Name: VS_TNM_S_Serum_Tumor_Markers_UICC

Descriptino: This ValueSet contains the TNM serum levels of tumor markers coded for germ cell tumors used with the S-symbol from TNM 8th edition UICC.

Name: VS_TNM_Stage_Group_UICC
Title: ValueSet TNM Stage Group UICC
Descriptino: The ValueSet contains codes for the TNM stage groups ranging from I to IV to group cancer patients with similar prognosis from TNM 8th edition UICC.

Name: VS_TNM_Suffix_ITC_SN_UICC

Descriptino: This ValueSet contains the isolated tumor cells (ITC) sentinel lymph nodes (sn) suffix for the N-category in TNM from TNM 8th edition UICC.

Name: VS_TNM_T_Multiplicity_UICC

Name: VS_TNM_T_Staging_Type_LOINC
